title: Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!!
synopsis: The Seibu Lions baseball team makes it to the next round of a baseball tournament thanks to the heroic efforts of its star player, Tabuchi, but the next stage will involve hard work and cooperation.
related_anime: ['Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!!', 'Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!! Gekitou Pennant Race', 'Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!! (ONA)']
